Class DatabasePlugin

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.jboard.struts.plugins.DatabasePlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.struts.action.PlugIn
public class DatabasePlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.struts.action.PlugIn

this class is launched when the application parse the struts-config.xml file. it initialize the Data storage for the entire application.
